jdm.name: Xfire
jdm.notes: There is no way to delete your account, you can only make some information private and/or delete it.

tosdr.tldr: It is impossible to delete your account from this service, according to the AccountKiller blacklist.
tosdr.case: no right to leave the service

topics.description: Once you subscribe to the service, will you have the right to leave it and remove your data?
topics.name: Right to leave the service
topics.subtitle: To avoid lock-in and stay in control
topics.title: Right to leave the service
